speaker: Alma
dialogue: And…you know…don’t tell people about the sleeping standing up thing, okay?

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Hey [], I was wonderin’… I haven’t seen mail from your friend lately. Are they doin’ okay?

speaker: Alma
dialogue: I’m sure {she’s/he’s/they’re} just fine…right? {She’s/He’s/They’re} probably busy. Better just send {her/him/them} a card just to remind them.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Oh and…would you mind adding something else to your stack? It’s a card project for the holidays.
